segments.text: Hello , I'd like to open an account .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which account would you like to open ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to open a savings account . What's the interest rate now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is 3.2 % . You may earn a little interest on money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there any minimum deposit for the first time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , the opening minimum deposit is 1,000 Yuan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For the later deposits , you can deposit any you want . Even one Yuan is OK .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are , a thousand Yuan and my ID .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait a moment , please ... Here is your bankbook . Keep it well please .
segments.speaker: S2
